title: Kutools
extract: Kutools - Combines More Than 300 Advanced Functions and Tools for Microsoft Excel. ... For example, Excel users can easily combine worksheets with several clicks, merge cells without losing data, paste to only visible cells, and so on.
extract_html: Kutools - Combines More Than 300 Advanced Functions and Tools for Microsoft Excel. ... For example, Excel users can easily combine worksheets with several clicks, merge cells without losing data, paste to only visible cells, and so on.
